name: A Penny Saved is A Penny Earned
name_original: A Penny Saved is A Penny Earned
description:
"A Penny Saved is A Penny Earned" is a short, choice-based video game that takes a player throughout a typical office work day with options on how to manage their money. Players will make choices throughout the day to promote a good work-life balance and practice good financial literacy.

End of game includes overview on how the player made choices and potential advice on how to better lead a balanced day. 

Created in RenPy game engine for UNC Pearl Hacks 2023.
